sentences.en: Because of this, researchers have experimented with other techniques, such as this one, to turn adult cells into beta-islet cells.
sentences.cn: 正因为此，研究者们只能使用其他的技术，例如成人干细胞转化胰岛细胞的方法。

sentences.en: Furthermore, these cells had transformed themselves into the insulin - producing islet beta cells.
sentences.cn: 并且, 母血细胞还自形转化为可以生产胰岛素的胰岛β细胞.

sentences.en: Islet stem cells transplantation is a novel way to cure diabetes mellitus.
sentences.cn: 胰岛干细胞移植是治疗糖尿病的一条新途径.

sentences.en: Islet transplantation is an effective method for curing type 1 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.cn: 胰岛移植作为治疗1型糖尿病的有效方法,临床应用前景较好.

sentences.en: Islet transplantation is one of the effective methods for diabetic therapy.
sentences.cn: 胰岛移植是治疗糖尿病的有效方法之一.

sentences.en: It completes its journey in the vast expanse of the Thousand - Islet Lake.

sentences.en: Obesity is characterized by hyperinsulinemia, hyperleptinemia, and an increase in islet volume.
sentences.cn: 高胰岛素血症 、 高瘦素血症和胰岛体积的增加是肥胖的特征.

sentences.en: Objective : To summarize the experience in the nonfunctional islet cell tumor.

The islet - 1 gene is a member of the LIM homeobox gene family.
sentences.cn: 新近研究表明,我们所关注的islet -1 基因既是LIM同源框基因家族的一员.

sentences.en: Therefore Governor Yiian's Islet is in perfect harmony with nature.

sentences.en: Unlike more lethal forms of pancreatic cancer, patients with islet cell neuroendocrine tumor have a high survival rate if the disease is removed promptly.
sentences.cn: 与更致命的胰腺癌种类不同，如果肿瘤及时切除，胰岛细胞神经内分泌肿瘤患者的存活率很高。
